plot: No Fire Zone is a feature length film about the final awful months of the 26 year long Sri Lankan civil war told by the people who lived through it...
title: No Fire Zone: The Killing Fields of Sri Lanka
plot_es: No Fire Zone is a feature length film about the final awful months of the 26 year long Sri Lankan civil war told by the people who lived through it...
original_name: No Fire Zone: The Killing Fields of Sri Lanka
plot_en: No Fire Zone is a feature length film about the final awful months of the 26 year long Sri Lankan civil war told by the people who lived through it...
